00024 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00025 class Pair : public Value
00026 {
00027 
00028 public: // nested types

00030         typedef T1 e1_type;
00031         typedef T2 e2_type;

00038         static const size_t sizeof_T2 = sizeof(T2);

00117 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00118 const std::string
00119 Pair<T1, T2>::classname
00120 ("Pair<" + Converter::nameof<T1>() + ", " + Converter::nameof<T2>() + ">");

00123 Pair<T1, T2>::Pair()
00124 :   e1_(0),
00125         e2_(0)
00126 {}
00127 
00128 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00129 Pair<T1, T2>::Pair(T1 e1, T2 e2)
00130 :   e1_(e1),
00131         e2_(e2)
00132 {}

00134 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00135 Pair<T1, T2>::Pair(const Pair<T1, T2>& pair)
00136 :   e1_(pair.e1_),
00137         e2_(pair.e2_)
00138 {}

00141 Pair<T1, T2>::~Pair()
00142 {}

00144 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00145 void
00146 Pair<T1, T2>::clear()
00147 {
00148         e1_ = 0;
00149         e2_ = 0;
00150 }

00152 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00153 double
00154 Pair<T1, T2>::score() const
00155 {
00156         return e1_;
00157 }
00158 
00159 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00160 bool
00161 Pair<T1, T2>::operator==(const Pair<T1, T2>& pair) const
00162 {
00163         return e1_ == pair.e1_ && e2_ == pair.e2_;
00164 }
00165 
00166 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00167 bool
00168 Pair<T1, T2>::operator!=(const Pair<T1, T2>& pair) const
00169 {
00170         return !(*this == pair);
00171 }
00172 
00173 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00174 bool
00175 Pair<T1, T2>::operator>(const Pair<T1, T2>& pair) const
00176 {
00177         return score() > pair.score();
00178 }
00179 
00180 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00181 bool
00182 Pair<T1, T2>::operator<(const Pair<T1, T2>& pair) const
00183 {
00184         return score() < pair.score();
00185 }
00186 
00187 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00188 void
00189 Pair<T1, T2>::parse(std::istream& is)
00190 {
00191         // force parsing as integer instead of a single character
00192         if (sizeof_T1 == sizeof_int8_t) is >> tmp_int, e1_ = tmp_int;
00193         else is >> e1_;
00194 
00195         if (sizeof_T2 == sizeof_int8_t) is >> tmp_int, e2_ = tmp_int;
00196         else is >> e2_;
00197 }
00198 
00199 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00200 T1&
00201 Pair<T1, T2>::e1()
00202 {
00203         return e1_;
00204 }
00205 
00206 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00207 T2&
00208 Pair<T1, T2>::e2()
00209 {
00210         return e2_;
00211 }
00212 
00213 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00214 const T1&
00215 Pair<T1, T2>::e1() const
00216 {
00217         return e1_;
00218 }
00219 
00220 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00221 const T2&
00222 Pair<T1, T2>::e2() const
00223 {
00224         return e2_;
00225 }
00226 
00227 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00228 void
00229 Pair<T1, T2>::print(std::ostream& os) const
00230 {
00231         // force printing as integer instead of a not printable character
00232         if (sizeof_T1 == sizeof_int8_t) os << (int) e1_;
00233         else os << e1_;
00234         os << ' ';
00235 
00236         if (sizeof_T2 == sizeof_int8_t) os << (int) e2_;
00237         else os << e2_;
00238 }
00239 
00240 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00241 void
00242 Pair<T1, T2>::to_bytes(ByteBuffer& buffer) const
00243 {
00244         buffer.resize(sizeof_value);
00245         std::memcpy(buffer.data(), &e1_, sizeof_T1);
00246         std::memcpy(buffer.data() + sizeof_T1, &e2_, sizeof_T2);
00247 }
00248 
00249 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00250 void
00251 Pair<T1, T2>::wrap(const char* data, size_t size)
00252 {
00253         assert(data != NULL);
00254         assert(size >= sizeof_value);
00255         std::memcpy(&e1_, data, sizeof_T1);
00256         std::memcpy(&e2_, data + sizeof_T1, sizeof_T2);
00257 }
00258 
00259 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00260 void
00261 Pair<T1, T2>::wrap(const ByteBuffer& buffer)
00262 {
00263         Value::wrap(buffer);
00264 }
